Title: "Sentiment Analysis with Azure Search: Implementation and Demos"

01            }        }    ]}Warning casesSee alsoBuilt-in skillsHow to define a skillsetSentiment Skill (V3)Demos - Azure AI SearchArticle•11/15/2023Demos are hosted apps that showcase search and AI enrichment functionality in AzureAI Search. Several of these demos include source code on GitHub so that you can seehow they were made. Microsoft built and hosts the following demos.DemonameDescriptionSource codeChat withyour dataAn Azure web app thatuses ChatGPT in AzureOpenAI with fictitioushealth plan data in asearch index.https://github.com/Azure-Samples/azure-search-openai-demo/NYC JobsdemoAn ASP.NET app withfacets, filters, details, geo-search (map controls).https://github.
